---

We need to gather requirements from all stakeholders for the design:

- [ ] Conduct interview with project owner
- [ ] Collate information gathered from Google forms filled by key stakeholders
- [ ] Engage design team to come up with a wireframe
- [ ] Meet engineering team to discuss the next steps
- [ ] Develop a prototype for the landing page
